remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 提供組態或應用程式的程式碼的問題所造成的錯誤的相關資訊。The provides information about errors caused by problems with configuration or application code. 範例是在網頁中發現錯誤時，ASP.NET 所發出的錯誤。An example is the error issued by ASP.NET when an error is found in a page. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需範例衍生自類別，請參閱本主題中所提供的範例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自類別來建立自訂的事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. 也顯示是組態檔，可讓 ASP.NET 可以使用這個自訂事件的摘錄。Also shown is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use this custom event. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent/CS/weberrorevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent/VB/weberrorevent.vb#1)]
